Name: Flying Whale Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1
What's this? Travel by riding the Flying Whale, which enables High Altitude Flight. Push the Jump key twice while in town to use High Altitude Flight.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
What's this? Travel by riding the Flying Whale, which enables High Altitude Flight. Press the Jump key twice in a row to use High Altitude Flight.
Double-click a location on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination, following the navigation line. (Auto-pilot is only available in certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1
What's this? Travel by riding the Flying Whale, which enables High Altitude Flight. Push the Jump key twice while in town to use High Altitude Flight.
